title: Amazon India may launch another app in India. Know more
description: Amazon explored launching a separate app for its digital payments service, Amazon Pay, in India. The shift aimed to enhance visibility and usage outside the main e-commerce app. The strategy aligned with a recent Rs 600 crore investment in Amazon Pay India, reflecting the company's continued focus on the Indian market.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
